name: Battle of Surabaya
summary: Musa, a thirteen-year-old shoe shiner, with Yumna, undergoes destiny through their adventure of waging war during the war time. Will they manage to bring peace among the troops keeping on fighting for nothing?

  • 别名: 苏腊巴亚之战
